ygData.subject: Re: Best guild name I can think of ;)
ygData.msgSnippet: From:           	LKW  ... Why not substitute red with crimson ? Blood is often described as being crimson, then don t sound so
ygData.messageBody:
From: LKW <leekw13@...>

> Just a side note, Red Orchids is also not a bad name but the word 'red'
> kinda give pple the impression that we shld wear red outfits (kinda
> gu-niang also), just like black suit in my UO guild The Dark Wardens, hehe.

Why not substitute red with "crimson"?

Blood is often described as being crimson, then don't sound so
guniang? *heh*

Anyway, my vote is still for Order of the Red Orchids

The server choice is still hanging in the air? For me, no matter what
server I go to, there will always be Kellendil, High Elven Enchanter.

On Karana, lvl8
On Innoruuk, lvl6
On Prexus lvl3.... :P


--


Love is in the air...
Get me a gas mask, quick!!!

Cya,
Praetor
